item.description:
Gratitude Workshop for 2010!

Start the year off with gratitude and learn and practice ways to maintain gratitude on a moment-to-moment level in 2010.

Optional Macrobiotic full course meal for $20 at 6:00pm, great meal! You can just come for dessert for $5.

99 Crescent St., Newton

Workshop 7-9pm

Cost $30, sliding scale to $15

Besides Gratitude workshops, Herb Pearce is a master of the Enneagram Personality Types system, having taught 2000 Enneagram workshops, worked with many individuals, couples, families, parents and children using this model as a therapist/coach, and he is the author of The Idiot's Guide to the Enneagram.

He also does team building trainings in organizations and teaches the Enneagram to schools, churches, groups, clubs, etc. as well as in homes where people organize workshops for friends, family or associates. He teaches many other workshops related to communication and personality differences, spiritual and self development.

Herb's book is available to purchase.

Herb Pearce
www.herbpearce.com
herb@herbpearce.com
781 648 3737
item.name: Gratitude Workshop for 2010!
